issue.title: [Developer] Provide a dashboard for improved Pull Request management
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11933](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11933). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The [spark PR dashboard](https://github.com/databricks/spark-pr-dashboard) (instance at
http://spark-prs.appspot.com/ ) provides a useful view of pull requests. Information is retrieved from the github API and persisted to a database for analyses, including classification of pull requests based on which files they modify. The added context provides greater visibility of PRs to the committers interested in reviewing/merging them.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11933?focusedCommentId=17299680) by David Li (lidavidm):*
It seems somewhat configurable already (just need some Github and Jiracredentials) though it seems there's also some Spark-specific CI integration with their own Jenkins instance that would need to be removed or disabled.
